summary: Iteration 9 - Frontend Testing: My Payroll tab visibility across all roles, ResultsSummary and TrainerChiefFeedback page crash fixes, DocumentPreview component, and mobile responsiveness. All features working correctly.

my_payroll_tab_visibility.admin_dashboard: WORKING - My Payroll tab visible with data-testid='my-payroll-tab', shows Payslips/Pay Advice/EA Form tabs
my_payroll_tab_visibility.assistant_admin_dashboard: WORKING - My Payroll tab visible, purple gradient styling
my_payroll_tab_visibility.trainer_dashboard: WORKING - Payroll tab visible under dashboard tabs

page_crash_fixes.results_summary_page: WORKING - Page loads without crash at /results-summary/{session_id}, shows 27 participants with pre-test/post-test/feedback status
page_crash_fixes.trainer_chief_feedback_page: WORKING - Page loads without crash, shows session selection dropdown and feedback form

document_preview_component.payslip_full_preview: WORKING - Full Preview button opens DocumentPreview component with zoom controls, print, download
document_preview_component.zoom_controls: WORKING - 100% zoom with zoom in/out/reset buttons
document_preview_component.print_download: WORKING - Print and Download buttons functional

mobile_responsiveness.admin_dashboard_mobile: WORKING - Tabs displayed in 2-column grid layout, all tabs accessible
mobile_responsiveness.my_payroll_mobile: WORKING - Payroll tab visible and clickable on mobile (390x844 viewport)

my_payroll_tab: Admin Dashboard - My Payroll tab with green gradient styling
Assistant Admin Dashboard - My Payroll tab with purple gradient styling
Coordinator Dashboard - My Payroll tab visible
All roles can access Payslips, Pay Advice, and EA Form sub-tabs
results_summary: Shows session name and participant count
Null-safe checks prevent crashes on empty data
trainer_chief_feedback: Null-safe checks prevent crashes on empty sessions/feedback
document_preview: Keyboard shortcuts (Esc to close, Ctrl+P to print)
mobile_responsiveness: Dashboard tabs in responsive grid layout
Payroll tab visible on small screens

critical_code_review_comments: MyPayroll component properly imported in all 4 dashboards (Admin, AssistantAdmin, Trainer, Coordinator)
ResultsSummary.jsx has null-safe checks: participants = summary.participants || []
TrainerChiefFeedback.jsx has null-safe checks for sessions and feedback template
DocumentPreview.jsx has proper data-testid attribute for testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: Iteration 9 complete. All P0 features verified: (1) My Payroll tab visible for Admin, Assistant Admin, Trainer, Coordinator - all working, (2) ResultsSummary page loads without crash - null-safe checks working, (3) TrainerChiefFeedback page loads without crash - null-safe checks working, (4) DocumentPreview component renders properly with zoom/print/download, (5) Mobile responsiveness verified - tabs accessible on mobile. No issues found.
